artist: Artist: Paul Petard; Publisher: Armchair Press, Reading, U.K.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical text and illustration of an elongated, non-human figure, printed on coated paper covers; 32 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Return of the Armchair Daydreams!...
